concept.title: Upgrade a Full Installation from the RPM Package
concept.shortdesc: When you upgrade a full installation from the RPM package, the new version uses the default directories to store configuration, data, log, and resource files. If the previous version used the default directories, the new version has access to the pipeline, log, and resource files created in the previous version.

conbody.p: upgradefull installation from RPMfull install from RPMupgradeIf the previous version used customized values for the directory environment variables, you must make the same customizations in the new version so that the new version can access the same pipeline, log, and resource files.
To upgrade a full installation from the RPM package, perform the following steps:

ol.li: Manually update the environment configuration file.
